me.dumfing.multiplayerTools

Class MultiplayerTools.ServerSentChatMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.dumfing.multiplayerTools.MultiplayerTools.ServerSentChatMessage
  • Enclosing class:
    MultiplayerTools

    public static class MultiplayerTools.ServerSentChatMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    Sent by the server to tell all clients that it's received a message

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServerSentChatMessage() 
      ServerSentChatMessage(java.lang.Object messageIn, com.esotericsoftware.kryonet.Connection sender, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,PlayerSoldier> players)
      Similar to ServerSentChatMessage but with an Object so you don't have to convert it yourself
      ServerSentChatMessage(java.lang.String message, com.esotericsoftware.kryonet.Connection sender, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,PlayerSoldier> players)
      Sends the message to all clients, uses a hashmap of all players and a connection so that it'll automatically generate a message with the user's name and the message without needing you to insert it yourself

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerSentChatMessage

        public ServerSentChatMessage()

      • ServerSentChatMessage

        public ServerSentChatMessage(java.lang.String message,
                             com.esotericsoftware.kryonet.Connection sender,
                             java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,PlayerSoldier> players)
        Sends the message to all clients, uses a hashmap of all players and a connection so that it'll automatically generate a message with the user's name and the message without needing you to insert it yourself
        Parameters:
        message - The message to be sent
        sender - The connection of the person who sent it
        players - All the connections and their respective playersoldiers

      • ServerSentChatMessage

        public ServerSentChatMessage(java.lang.Object messageIn,
                             com.esotericsoftware.kryonet.Connection sender,
                             java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,PlayerSoldier> players)
        Similar to ServerSentChatMessage but with an Object so you don't have to convert it yourself
        Parameters:
        messageIn - Supposed to be a ClientSentChatMessage object, will throw an error otherwise
        sender - The connection for the person who's sending the message
        players - The hashmap of all players connected
